snippet: A gain in technology stocks was led by Apple, which surged $22.21, or 4.8 percent, after comments by the billionaire Carl C. Icahn.
abstract: Stock market manages small gains after upturn in technology companies offsets weaknesses in other parts of market, including drop in airline shares.
lead_paragraph: A gain in technology stocks was led by Apple, which surged $22.21, or 4.8 percent, after comments by the billionaire Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: A Rise in Technology Keeps the Market Ahead
headline.print_headline: A Rise in Technology Keeps the Market Ahead
